name: Sea Monster Simulator
description:
Remember the monsters from your worst nightmares? Bring those nightmares to life as you control this huge Sea Monster. Eat all the people you can before the timer runs out. Complete 8 fun missions or go for the high score. Go racing around the beach. Go in search of some great white sharks to eat. Total 3D Sea Monster Rampage!

Features:
--Control a Huge 3D Sea Monster
--Swim in the water or go on the beach
--Catch and eat the people before they get away
--Swim after those elusive Great White Sharks for a snack
--Fun 3D Graphics with a Medieval Theme
--Realistic moving people


They used to hide in your closet, under your bed and right behind your curtains. But now, you have a unique opportunity to become a master of one of those scary creatures and inflict destruction, fear and woe onto unaware people, animals and sea inhabitants.

From the creator of the Goat Simulator, Shark Simulator, Dinosaur Simulator and many other fascinating and adventurous games, we present you "Sea Monster Simulator". An incredible game that gives you absolute freedom and opportunity to do whatever you want with no fear for retribution.

Just imagine the power that the Sea Monster gives you for realizing all your evil plans. Get eating today! Download this Sea Monster Simulator now!
